title: Twitter Chief Elon Musk Tries to Reassure Advertisers at Miami Beach Forum
description: The billionaire says he is receptive to brands’ concerns but will give priority to free speech.

title: Join the Debate: Should Anyone Spend $100 on an Umbrella?
description: Umbrella aficionados say sturdy models are worth investing in. Others say no thanks, arguing that they are all doomed to eventually disappear or break.

title: Meta Opens Horizon Worlds VR App to Teens as Company Seeks More Metaverse Users
description: Move comes after organizations ask Meta to abandon plans to open app to those 13 to 17.

title: Netflix Winds Down DVD-Rental Business
description: Netflix plans to ship its last red DVD envelopes in September, ending 25 years of mailing shows and movies to subscribers.

title: Apple Opens Its First Retail Store in India
description: The tech company opened a bricks-and-mortar location in Mumbai and is planning to open a second location Thursday in New Delhi.

title: Musk Says AI Project Will Seek to Understand Nature of Universe
description: Elon Musk spoke about his AI ambitions in an interview with Fox News Channel’s “Tucker Carlson Tonight.”
